text:
Somewhere in the middle, probably. Not sure how active I'll be on slack, but I'm wanting to at least pop in here and there just to see what's happening.

But totally, don't stop believing!

Software is a lever made of levers, and the engine of its own modification. Surely there's a way to bootstrap that power right into our (and/or the end user's) own hands, so that having a computer at your disposal actually means having a computer at your disposal! ... That's my vision of the future, anyway :)
